text: Cast a Giant Shadow is a 1966 American action movie directed by Melville Shavelson and was based on the biography by Ted Berkamn. It stars John Wayne, Angie Dickinson, Yul Brynner, Frank Sinatra, Senta Berger, Kirk Douglas, Topol, Allan Cuthbertson, Jeremy Kemp and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 action movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:American action movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Melville Shavelson Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Israel Category:Movies set in the 1940s
title: Cast a Giant Shadow
